list_definition.definition: a person who writes articles and reports for a newspaper

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Reporters and photographers rushed to the scene of the fire.

list_ex_of_english: We also evaluate systematic tendencies for specific reporter pairs to agree with each other more than other pairs.
More fundamentally, it does not say anything about the degree of agreement between reporters on specific items.
A reporter will not attempt to answer these questions explicitly as s/he writes a story.
The reporters' personal interpretations hold no place in the exposition of facts.
Thus, there is much more agreement between the reporters on items that the child does not know than on items that the child does know.
Fold-induction is calculated relative to the activity of each reporter alone.
Ninety reporters attended the proceedings and fifty-eight briefs were submitted by some 150 interest groups.
The consistency both in reporters and in the nature of questions asked may lessen the possibility of confounding influences.
